title: Decisive discipline: every move you make
creator_credit: Institute of Educational Administration and Bill Rogers
brief_description: A kit produced by Bill Rogers and the Institute of Educational Administration which advocates certain decisive discipline strategies which could be utilised by a classroom teacher. The kit consists of two videotapes and an accompanying booklet which provides background information and print summaries from the videotapes. Highlights some classroom discipline problems and strategies for dealing with them.
